mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_pos_transaction_handled_info ( record_id, amount, pay_mode, voucher, remark, create_user_id, create_date ) VALUE ( #{handledInfo.recordId}, #{handledInfo.amount}, #{handledInfo.payMode}, #{handledInfo.voucher}, #{handledInfo.remark}, #{handledInfo.createUserId}, #{handledInfo.createTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT `id` AS `id`, record_id AS recordId, amount, pay_mode AS payMode, voucher, remark, create_user_id AS createUserId, create_date AS createTime FROM user_pos_transaction_handled_info WHERE record_id = #{recordId}
